<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Metric Type"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/metrics/types/{typeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a specific metric type definition by its unique identifier. Returns the metric configuration including name, calculation method, and threshold settings.

**Prerequisites**
1. **typeId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/metrics/types](/docs/api/slas/list-metrics) to list available metric types. Extract `Items[].MetricTypeId` from the response.

**Workflow Example**
1. List metric types: [GET /api/v1.0/metrics/types](/docs/api/slas/list-metrics) â†’ identify target metric.
2. Call this endpoint: [GET /api/v1.0/metrics/types/\{typeId\}](/docs/api/slas/get-metric-by-id) with the metric type UUID.

**Related Endpoints:**
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/metrics/\{id\}](/docs/api/slas/delete-metric-metrics) - Delete a custom metric type

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"Client","in":"header","required":false,"example":"WebBrowser","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"ProductId","in":"header","required":false,"example":0,"schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":false,"example":"{{BasicAuth}}","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"example":"{{SiteId}}","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"typeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The typeId parameter"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
